name: Hatsume Mei | My Hero Academia
description:

also follow me on pixiv https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/58889620

this is a Lora of hatsume mei from my hero academia anime.

use lora weight of 0.7-1

use tags like - pink hair, short hair, goggles on head for more depth.

Use the preview images as a starting point.
